name: Earthshatter Tunic
tooltip:
Earthshatter TunicLevel 60

Rimblat Earthshatter at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make an Earthshatter Tunic if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Tunic, 25 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 4 Arcanite Bars and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Tunic
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 25
- Arcanite Bar x 4
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
